name: Promise of Glory
flavorText: Lost and found again through the ages, these bracers bear the names of all who have worn them. Each one found great glory, but not all survived to reap the rewards.
flavorTextHtml: Lost and found again through the ages, these bracers bear the names of all who have worn them. Each one found great glory, but not all survived to reap the rewards.

primary.textHtml: Critical Hit Chance Increased by [4.5 - 6.0]%

secondary.textHtml: 5% chance to spawn a Nephalem Glory globe when you Blind an enemy. [4 - 6]%
secondary.text: 5% chance to spawn a Nephalem Glory globe when you Blind an enemy. [4 - 6]%
